::: HELL BEAST ::: My loyal little bug. Yes, your services are needed. I want 
you to prepare for a battle with Shredder, Quickstrike, and three 
Oblitercons. Im not sure if there are any others.....

::: He paused for a moment :::

::: HELL BEAST ::: Actually...why dont you go and scout them out. A recon 
mission. Find out how many of them there are and if they are armed.
